    • portfolioMarginAccountInfo

      public String portfolioMarginAccountInfo(LinkedHashMap<String,Object> parameters)
      Get Portfolio Margin current account information. GET /v1/pmAccountInfo
      Parameters:
      parameters - LinkedHashedMap of String,Object pair where String is the name of the parameter and Object is the value of the parameter

      asset -- mandatory/string
      recvWindow -- optional/long
      Returns:
      String
      See Also:
      • https://binance-docs.github.io/apidocs/futures/en/#portfolio-margin-account-information-user_data
